title: Memebet
author: Memebet
content: Memebet improves online poker by utilizing blockchain technology, decentralizing operations, and ensuring transparency, security, and immutability, addressing issues associated with traditional platforms.Ever wondered about the real-world utility of #Memecoin?Why not evolve beyond the fun #FOMO and fork a Texas Hold‚Äôem application with practical value?Presenting Memebet! A meme protocol that truly withstands market fluctuations, loved and utilized by crypto users‚ù§Ô∏èüî•OVER 100 ETH RAISED FOR $MEMEBET PRESALEüïëUNISWAP LISTING TIME: 2 PM UTC NOV. 24üöÄNO TAX, ONLY SKYROCKETTwitter: @memebetx

comments.author: GreenStox
comments.body: I think meme coins are trending now, just now I also claimed several airdrops and the project they created was memecoin, is this a sign that the market will suddenly rise.

comments.author: Publictalk792
comments.body: Quote from: GreenStox on November 24, 2023, 01:01:20 PMI think meme coins are trending now, just now I also claimed several airdrops and the project they created was memecoin, is this a sign that the market will suddenly rise.You are right memecoins are now trending. In previous days we saw a memecoins on the Binance launchpad too. But it is not the sign that the market will suddenly rise. If you think that so you should also think about the other side that if it can suddenly rise so it can suddenly fall too.For you @Memebet if you are the team member so I will recommend that you should higher a manager in the services board and you should promote your website with signature campaign. By this people will make a research on your coin and if they will think that your coin has worth so they will join the presale. I think this is the best way to promote your coin if your coin is real and if you are scammer so keep away from this forum here is no space for you.Here is the Services board link. You should visit.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=52.0

comments.author: Bureau
comments.body: I have no idea what this project is meant to gain. There are isn't anything relevant or important for any investor to invest. I might be naive to understand the project. What I understood is that anyone can gain a good profit after investing in the project.Quote from: Memebet on November 24, 2023, 12:05:40 PMMemebet improves online poker by utilizing blockchain technology, decentralizing operations, and ensuring transparency, security, and immutability, addressing issues associated with traditional platformsWhy I am saying that is because the OP said the memebet is going to change the way poker is being played traditionally. Then he/she comes up with another feature. Quote from: Memebet on November 24, 2023, 12:05:40 PMPresenting Memebet! A meme protocol that truly withstands market fluctuations, loved and utilized by crypto users‚ù§Ô∏èSo, my question is for the @OP, is it a meme coin or a blockchain that is here to solve gambling issues. As I am to much confused with what is being offered.

comments.author: glendall
comments.body: Quote from: GreenStox on November 24, 2023, 01:01:20 PMI think meme coins are trending now, just now I also claimed several airdrops and the project they created was memecoin, is this a sign that the market will suddenly rise.Meme trends never die, even when the market is down, joining memes also exist and always imitate the memes that were trending at the beginning. So there are a lot of meme coins, not because the market is improving, but it always opens up opportunities to find new investors and manipulate prices later and lead to fraud like before.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Quote from: Bureau on November 24, 2023, 01:58:08 PM-snip-They want to gain #FOMO ~xdI think the title will be suitable, making the creator rich ~XD Based on the explanation project. I know, these can be running without blockchain at all (do you think poker without blockchain are not transparant ?)One things for investor should be avoided, If a project promise you getting rich.

comments.author: nelson4lov
comments.body: Quote from: GreenStox on November 24, 2023, 01:01:20 PMI think meme coins are trending now, just now I also claimed several airdrops and the project they created was memecoin, is this a sign that the market will suddenly rise.In a full blown crypto bull market, pretty much anything will run and memecoins will be no different ‚Äî Safemoon and Shiba inu rocked the last bull run so it won't ne surprising if there are existing or yet to be created memecoins that will rock the incoming bull run. If you're looking for signs that the market will probably appreciate then look back on the market's reaction to the previous bitcoin halving events while keeping in mind that the next bitcoin bull run is coming in T-6 months.

comments.author: Sophokles
comments.body: Quote from: Memebet on November 24, 2023, 12:05:40 PMMemebet improves online poker by utilizing blockchain technology, decentralizing operations, and ensuring transparency, security, and immutability, addressing issues associated with traditional platforms.Ever wondered about the real-world utility of #Memecoin?Why not evolve beyond the fun #FOMO and fork a Texas Hold‚Äôem application with practical value?Presenting Memebet! A meme protocol that truly withstands market fluctuations, loved and utilized by crypto users‚ù§Ô∏èüî•OVER 100 ETH RAISED FOR $MEMEBET PRESALEüïëUNISWAP LISTING TIME: 2 PM UTC NOV. 24üöÄNO TAX, ONLY SKYROCKETTwitter: @memebetxGambling can be one of the best use cases for crypto as this open payment network is ideal for such a platform. There are already some popular gambling platforms out there like Roobet, stake and a few others, that have evolved around crypto. The initiative to create a decentralized gambling platform can be profitable as this has demands in the industry but the real problem will be the trust issue. There were some gambling platforms that scammed with user funds even when they ran signature campaigns in the forum. So users need to do frequent transactions for betting and decentralized operations can solve the trust issue.

comments.author: Bushdark
comments.body: This project might do pretty well in the market if it has a very good team and that are ready to support it and promote the project till it get to the moon. We don't need to underestimate any cryptocurrency project because the power of it skyrocketing lies on the shoulders of the team and effort to take it to the moon. Having a good community that has real members not bots can also help and interest the community investors to invest more on it. The bull is coming and if the game is well played, we might be surprised of seeing it getting listed on so many exchanges.
